Hedge

Contact | Privacy Policy



Hedge is a free iOS application created by Jacob Tepperman in May 2022.

This app deals in no way with real money or transfers, it serves only as a fake betting app for fun.

The goal of creating this application was to make a way to bet on real-life events with fake money.

Click the link above to send a contact form, or email me at jtepp@icloud.com

The backend for this application is entirely based in Google's Firebase service.

Feel free to contact them with any security or privacy concerns.
